venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
We're super excited to welcome back Brant Cooper & Patrick Vlaskovits, co-authors of The Entrepreneur's Guide to Customer Development, to provide us with a preview of their new book, The Lean Entrepreneur.

Come learn how to be a Lean Entrepreneur & enter your mailing address in the RSVP for a chance to win a copy of the book! We're giving away 50* copies!

We'll be checking for registration at the door, so be sure to RSVP!


Schedule:

6:30-6:45: Pizza & Networking

6:45-8:00: The Lean Entrepreneur Presentation/Workshop with Brant & Patrick

8:00-8:30: Q&A

 

The Lean Entrepreneur Presentation/Workshop with Brant & Patrick

Brant & Patrick will share a sneak peak of the new tools (market segmentation, value stream discovery + more) and case studies in the book.

Learn:

  • How to develop rock solid market segments and why they're key to success.
  • How to document assumptions around business activities, expected customer behavior, and actionable metrics.
  • How to develop a road map of customer interaction and experimentation to validate your business model.
  • The Innovation Spectrum
  • much more!

In addition, Mike Volpe, HubSpot's CMO will be joining Brant & Patrick on stage and the 3 of them will be giving away books to many of the attendees!

After Party at MassChallenge!

And if you just can't get enough - MassChallenge is hosting an after party for Brant, Patrick & the rest of us after the event.

Why is there a Fee?

As we sometimes do with special guests who travel here from far & distant lands (or, at least, the west coast), we're charging a small ($10) fee for this event to bring Brant & Patrick back to Boston. However, at Brant & Patrick's gracious request we'll use the proceeds to give away copies of The Lean Entrepreneur as prizes to 50* of the attendees.

* actual # will be determined by how many we can buy with proceeds, we're estimating 50.
item.how_to_find_us: Sign in at the front desk and proceed to the 1st floor
item.name: The Lean Entrepreneur - Brant Cooper & Patrick Vlaskovits!
